nodes.text: Denab was a planet in the Sluis sector of the Outer Rim. Prior to the Battle of Yavin, it was the site where Rebel Alliance starfighters led by Commander Grisserno defeated the Imperial Fourth Attack Squadron, composed of Victory-class Star Destroyers, at the Battle of Denab.
The PC game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places the Sluis Sector and, consequently, Denab, in the Galactic Core.
